overview: Jason Rottenberg is a Managing Director of AVP. Jason has spent the last dozen years, founding, building and funding early-stage technology companies, and is a frequent speaker on the topic of technology commercialization and the intersection of the defense and commercial markets. Jason has been involved in the founding and exits of numerous technology companies and he was the founder of Muse Ventures and IT Angel. Jason was previously a manager in Arthur Andersenâ€™s Silicon Valley office and began his career in Washington, DC. Jason graduated from Georgetown University with a B.S. degree and earned an MBA with highest distinction from Harvard University, where he was named a Baker Scholar.
